game.name: Train Simulator: Intercity Mod
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 3DZUG has recreated seven IC cars in detail for Train Simulator. On top of that, we provide the control car so that you can operate a true-to-life reversible train.
game.shortDescriptionEn: 3DZUG has recreated seven IC cars in detail for Train Simulator. On top of that, we provide the control car so that you can operate a true-to-life reversible train.
